subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Andre Greipel, a German sprinter, beat Mark Cavendish — his former teammate and sometimes adversary — by the length of a wheel Tuesday to win the 10th stage
snippet: Andre Greipel, a German sprinter, beat Mark Cavendish — his former teammate and sometimes adversary — by the length of a wheel Tuesday to win the 10th stage
